page.title: 07Legionnaires Disease(contd).
page.content: The outbreak started on April 27th 1985 and was over by June 16th 1985.This has affected many people over the Stafford area and affected at least one person in our area. One of the people is Robert C Patterson of Moorfields, Stafford . His statement on his illness follows: " I visited the Stafford General Hospital with my wife and family for her appointment on the 15th April 1985 and we were within the Hospital Walls for around 25 minutes. I was personally taken ill on the 20th April 1985 suffering from a temperature of 105 degrees which lasted for three days,my own doctor came to visit and said I had the flu.He rushed me to the hospital shortly afterwards,I was also delirious full of aches and pains and suffering loss of breath.
